GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an array containing the requested user

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object for the requested article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/article_id.description: updates the vote count for the requested article_id by the amount in the body

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the requested article_id and returns the comment
